java.lang.Object

public class ResolutionUtils
extends java.lang.Object

link

public static DependencyLink link(IDeployResolutionContext context,
                                  Unit source,
                                  EClass sourceType,
                                  Unit target,
                                  EClass targetType)
Create a service link between the services of two units.

Parameters:
context - the resolution context
source - the source unit
sourceType - the type of the source service consumed by the source unit
target - the target unit
targetType - the type of the target service provided by the target unit
Returns:
the service link created or null if single source and target services cannot be identified

Parameters:
context - the resolution context
sourceRequirement - the source service
target - the target unit
targetType - the type of the target service provided by the target unit
Returns:
the service link created or null if single source and target services cannot be identified

doDefaultElementCreation

public static DeployModelObject doDefaultElementCreation(java.lang.String templateURIString,
                                                         Topology container)
Create and the units in the template to the topology, and return the annotated Unit from the list of created units.

One reason for the annotation is to allow resolutions to cast the results of the addition to a particular Unit type.

Parameters:
templateURIString -
container -
Returns:
the EObject for the ui element or null

                                                                            Topology container)
Used to create elements in diagram from palette.

Parameters:

container -
Returns:
all of the created objects

getFirstTopologyRoot

public static java.lang.String getFirstTopologyRoot(Topology topology)
Return the Unit name/anchor for the Unit specified by the <core:annotation context="topology_root"> (the <core:detail value=/>).

This name can be used to look up the 'root' or most important Unit in a .template.

Parameters:
topology - the topology input
Returns:
the topology root unit name

getTopologyRoots

public static java.util.Collection<?> getTopologyRoots(Topology topology)
Return the Annotation details values for the <core:annotation context="topology_root">. These contexts are used to indicate that one Unit is to be considered the 'root' or most important Unit in a Topology.

Parameters:
topology - the topology input
Returns:
the list of topology root unit names

intelligentDeepCopy

public static java.util.Collection<Unit> intelligentDeepCopy(java.util.List<Unit> templateUnits,
                                                             Topology topDest)
Deeply copies the units and all their contained objects, fixing the core links.

Does not add units to the topology, but their names are set to be unique in relation to the topology.

Parameters:
templateUnits - a list of Units to be copied.
topDest - used to assure creation of unique names in copies.
Returns:
Collection a collection of copied units (order may be changed).

intelligentDeepCopy

public static java.util.Collection<Unit> intelligentDeepCopy(java.util.List<Unit> templateUnits,
                                                             Topology topDest,
                                                             boolean makeNameUnique)
Deeply copies the units and all their contained objects, fixing the core links.

Does not add units to the topology, but optionally sets their name to be unique when they are added.

Parameters:
templateUnits - a list of Units to be copied.
topDest - used to create unique names to copies.
makeNameUnique - true if unique names should be assigned to the copies based on the topology unit names already in use.
Returns:
Collection a collection of copied units (order may be changed).

intelligentDeepCopyMap

public static java.util.Map<Unit,Unit> intelligentDeepCopyMap(java.util.List<Unit> templateUnits,
                                                              Topology topDest,
                                                              boolean makeNameUnique)
Deeply copies the units and all their contained objects, fixing the core links.

Does not add units to the topology, but optionally sets their name to be unique when they are added.

Parameters:
templateUnits - a list of Units to be copied.
topDest - used to create unique names to copies.
makeNameUnique - true if unique names should be assigned to the copies based on the topology unit names already in use.
Returns:
Map a map of original units to copy units.

makeNameUnique

public static void makeNameUnique(DeployModelObject copy,
                                  Topology container)
Deprecated. use .

This is a special version of UnitUtil.generateUniqueName(DeployModelObject, String) specifically for dropping new units on the diagram. make Init's name and display name unique for the topology

Parameters:
copy - the unit to be uniqued
container - the topology to match the units in

Returns:
the status of the update.

                                              java.lang.Object value,
                                              IDeployResolutionContext context)
Set an attribute value using a sub-resolution.

Parameters:

attribute - the attribute to be set

Returns:

                                                                    IDeployResolutionContext context)
Proxy method to call DeployResolution.createResolutionContext which is not always visible.

Parameters:
status - the status
context - the callers resolution context
Returns:
a new resolution context

createResolutionContext

public static IDeployResolutionContext createResolutionContext(DeployModelObject object)
Creates a resolution context over a generic deploy status on the deploy object.

Parameters:
object - the deploy object on which a status will be created (but not added).
Returns:
a resolution context over the generated object status.

removeMemberFromGroup

public static void removeMemberFromGroup(Unit member,
                                         Unit group)
Remove the member from the group.

Deletes all member links with source=group and target=member.

Parameters:
member - the member link target.
group - the member link source.

hosted - the hosted unit.
Returns:

                          Unit hosted)

Parameters:

removeFromTopology

public static void removeFromTopology(Unit unit)
Removes a unit from a topology along with all the links it is the source or target of.

Parameters:
unit - the unit to be deleted.

group

public static MemberLink group(Unit group,
                               Unit member)
Groups the member unit.

Parameters:
group - the group unit.
member - the member unit to be added.
Returns:
the member link if created, null if not.

unhost

public static boolean unhost(Unit hosted)
Deletes all hosting links in the topology for a unit.

Note: the method does not check the install state of the unit.

Parameters:
hosted - a hosted unit.
Returns:
true if one or more hosting links have been deleted, false otherwise.

addAllHostedUnits

public static java.util.List<Unit> addAllHostedUnits(Unit unit)
Adds all the units hosted in the unit to the topology (recursive).

Note: performs discovery.

Parameters:
unit - a unit in a topology.
Returns:
a list of all hosted units (directly or indirectly).

partialIntelligentDeepCopyMap

public static java.util.Map<Unit,Unit> partialIntelligentDeepCopyMap(java.util.List<Unit> templateUnits,
                                                                     Topology topDest,
                                                                     boolean makeNameUnique)
Deeply copies the units and all their contained objects, fixing the core links.

Does not add units to the topology, but optionally sets their name to be unique when they are edded.

Parameters:
templateUnits - a list of Units to be copied.
topDest - used to create unique names to copies.
makeNameUnique - true if unique names should be assigned to the copies based on the topology unit names already in use.
Returns:
Map a map of original units to copy units.

public static java.util.Collection<Unit> partialIntelligentDeepCopy(java.util.List<Unit> templateUnits,
                                                                    Topology topDest,
                                                                    boolean makeNameUnique)
Deeply copies the units and all their contained objects, fixing the core links.

Does not add units to the topology, but optionally sets their name to be unique when they are edded.

Parameters:
templateUnits - a list of Units to be copied.
topDest - used to create unique names to copies.
makeNameUnique - true if unique names should be assigned to the copies based on the topology unit names already in use.
Returns:
Collection a collection of copied units (order may be changed).
